DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: FDP grid topography for Dryad
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: X, Y coordinates and elevation relative to an arbitrary starting point, for all corners of the 10 m x 10 m grid demarking the LCBS forest dynamics plot. In addition, change in elevation and steepness (degrees) between adjacent grid points.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: Fragmentation
Tropical
Degradation
Forest
biomass
